TargetCurrencyBaseRate.title: Exchange Rate. Target_ Currency Base Rate. Rate
TargetCurrencyBaseRate.description: In the case of a target currency with denominations of small value, the unit base.

ExchangeMarketID.title: Exchange Rate. Exchange Market Identifier. Identifier
ExchangeMarketID.description: An identifier for the currency exchange market used as the source of this exchange rate.

CalculationRate.title: Exchange Rate. Calculation Rate. Rate
CalculationRate.description: The factor applied to the source currency to calculate the target currency.

MathematicOperatorCode.title: Exchange Rate. Mathematic Operator Code. Code
MathematicOperatorCode.description: A code signifying whether the calculation rate is a multiplier or a divisor.

Date.title: Exchange Rate. Date
Date.description: The date on which the exchange rate was established.

ForeignExchangeContract.title: Exchange Rate. Foreign Exchange_ Contract. Contract

ExternalReference.title: External Reference. Details
ExternalReference.description: A class to describe an external object, such as a document stored at a remote location.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

URI.title: External Reference. URI. Identifier
URI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource.

DocumentHash.title: External Reference. Document Hash. Text
DocumentHash.description: A hash value for the externally stored object.

HashAlgorithmMethod.title: External Reference. Hash Algorithm Method. Text
HashAlgorithmMethod.description: A hash algorithm used to calculate the hash value of the externally stored object.

ExpiryDate.title: External Reference. Expiry Date. Date
ExpiryDate.description: The date on which availability of the resource can no longer be relied upon.

ExpiryTime.title: External Reference. Expiry Time. Time
ExpiryTime.description: The time after which availability of the resource can no longer be relied upon.

MimeCode.title: External Reference. Mime Code. Code
MimeCode.description: A code signifying the mime type of the external object.

FormatCode.title: External Reference. Format Code. Code
FormatCode.description: A code signifying the format of the external object.

EncodingCode.title: External Reference. Encoding Code. Code
EncodingCode.description: A code signifying the encoding/decoding algorithm used with the external object.

CharacterSetCode.title: External Reference. Character Set Code. Code
CharacterSetCode.description: A code signifying the character set of an external document.

FileName.title: External Reference. File Name. Name
FileName.description: The file name of the external object.

FinancialAccount.title: Financial Account. Details
FinancialAccount.description: A class to describe a financial account.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Financial Account. Identifier
ID.description: The identifier for this financial account; the bank account number.

Name.title: Financial Account. Name
Name.description: The name of this financial account.

AliasName.title: Financial Account. Alias_ Name. Name
AliasName.description: An alias for the name of this financial account, to be used in place of the actual account name for security reasons.

AccountTypeCode.title: Financial Account. Account Type Code. Code
AccountTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of this financial account.

AccountFormatCode.title: Financial Account. Account Format Code. Code
AccountFormatCode.description: A code signifying the format of this financial account.

CurrencyCode.title: Financial Account. Currency Code. Code
CurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency in which this financial account is held.

PaymentNote.title: Financial Account. Payment_ Note. Text
PaymentNote.description: Free-form text applying to the Payment for the owner of this account.

FinancialInstitutionBranch.title: Financial Account. Financial Institution_ Branch. Branch
FinancialInstitutionBranch.description: The branch of the financial institution associated with this financial account.

Country.title: Financial Account. Country
Country.description: The country in which the holder of the financial account is domiciled.

FinancialInstitution.title: Financial Institution. Details
FinancialInstitution.description: A class to describe a financial institution.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Financial Institution. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this financial institution. It is recommended that the ISO 9362 Bank Identification Code (BIC) be used as the ID.

Name.title: Financial Institution. Name
Name.description: The name of this financial institution.

Address.title: Financial Institution. Address
Address.description: The address of this financial institution.

GoodsItem.title: Goods Item. Details
GoodsItem.description: A class to describe a separately identifiable quantity of goods of a single product type.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Goods Item. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this goods item.

SequenceNumberID.title: Goods Item. Sequence Number. Identifier
SequenceNumberID.description: A sequence number differentiating a specific goods item within a consignment.

Description.title: Goods Item. Description. Text
Description.description: Text describing this goods item to identify it for customs, statistical, or transport purposes.

HazardousRiskIndicator.title: Goods Item. Hazardous Risk_ Indicator. Indicator
HazardousRiskIndicator.description: An indication that the transported goods item is subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Declared Customs_ Value. Amount
DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.description: The total declared value for customs purposes of the goods item.

DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Declared For Carriage_ Value. Amount
DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.description: The value of this goods item, declared by the shipper or his agent solely for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage, in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Declared Statistics_ Value. Amount
DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.description: The total declared value of all the goods items in the same consignment with this goods item that have the same statistical heading.

FreeOnBoardValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Free On Board_ Value. Amount
FreeOnBoardValueAmount.description: The monetary amount that has to be or has been paid as calculated under the applicable trade delivery.

InsuranceValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Insurance_ Value. Amount
InsuranceValueAmount.description: The amount covered by insurance for this goods item.

ValueAmount.title: Goods Item. Value. Amount
ValueAmount.description: The amount on which a duty, tax, or fee will be assessed.

GrossWeightMeasure.title: Goods Item. Gross_ Weight. Measure
GrossWeightMeasure.description: The weight of this goods item, including packing and packaging but excluding the carrier's equipment.

NetWeightMeasure.title: Goods Item. Net_ Weight. Measure
NetWeightMeasure.description: The weight of this goods item, excluding packing but including packaging that normally accompanies the goods.

NetNetWeightMeasure.title: Goods Item. Net Net_ Weight. Measure
NetNetWeightMeasure.description: The total weight of this goods item, excluding all packing and packaging.

ChargeableWeightMeasure.title: Goods Item. Chargeable_ Weight. Measure
ChargeableWeightMeasure.description: The weight on which a charge is to be based.

GrossVolumeMeasure.title: Goods Item. Gross_ Volume. Measure
GrossVolumeMeasure.description: The volume of this goods item, normally calculated by multiplying its maximum length, width, and height.

NetVolumeMeasure.title: Goods Item. Net_ Volume. Measure
NetVolumeMeasure.description: The volume contained by a goods item, excluding the volume of any packaging material.

Quantity.title: Goods Item. Quantity
Quantity.description: The number of units making up this goods item.

PreferenceCriterionCode.title: Goods Item. Preference Criterion Code. Code
PreferenceCriterionCode.description: A code signifying the treatment preference for this goods item according to international trading agreements.

RequiredCustomsID.title: Goods Item. Required_ Customs Identifier. Identifier
RequiredCustomsID.description: An identifier for a set of tariff codes required to specify a type of goods for customs, transport, statistical, or other regulatory purposes.

CustomsStatusCode.title: Goods Item. Customs Status Code. Code
CustomsStatusCode.description: A code assigned by customs to signify the status of this goods item.

CustomsTariffQuantity.title: Goods Item. Customs Tariff Quantity. Quantity
CustomsTariffQuantity.description: Quantity of the units in this goods item as required by customs for tariff, statistical, or fiscal purposes.

CustomsImportClassifiedIndicator.title: Goods Item. Customs Import_ Classified Indicator. Indicator
CustomsImportClassifiedIndicator.description: An indicator that this goods item has been classified for import by customs (true) or not (false).

ChargeableQuantity.title: Goods Item. Chargeable_ Quantity. Quantity
ChargeableQuantity.description: The number of units in the goods item to which charges apply.

ReturnableQuantity.title: Goods Item. Returnable_ Quantity. Quantity
ReturnableQuantity.description: The number of units in the goods item that may be returned.

TraceID.title: Goods Item. Trace_ Identifier. Identifier
TraceID.description: An identifier for use in tracing this goods item, such as the EPC number used in RFID.

Item.title: Goods Item. Item
Item.description: Product information relating to a goods item.

GoodsItemContainer.title: Goods Item. Goods Item Container
GoodsItemContainer.description: The transporting of a goods item in a unit of transport equipment (e.g., container).

FreightAllowanceCharge.title: Goods Item. Freight_ Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge
FreightAllowanceCharge.description: A cost incurred by the shipper in moving goods, by whatever means, from one place to another under the terms of the contract of carriage. In addition to transport costs, this may include such elements as packing, documentation, loading, unloading, and insurance to the extent that they relate to the freight costs.

InvoiceLine.title: Goods Item. Invoice Line
InvoiceLine.description: Information about an invoice line relating to this goods item.

Temperature.title: Goods Item. Temperature
Temperature.description: The temperature of the goods item.

ContainedGoodsItem.title: Goods Item. Contained_ Goods Item. Goods Item
ContainedGoodsItem.description: A goods item contained in this goods item.

OriginAddress.title: Goods Item. Origin_ Address. Address
OriginAddress.description: The region in which the goods have been produced or manufactured, according to criteria laid down for the purposes of application of the customs tariff, or of quantitative restrictions, or of any other measure related to trade.

Delivery.title: Goods Item. Delivery
Delivery.description: The delivery of this goods item.

Pickup.title: Goods Item. Pickup
Pickup.description: The pickup of this goods item.

Despatch.title: Goods Item. Despatch
Despatch.description: The despatch of this goods item.

MeasurementDimension.title: Goods Item. Measurement_ Dimension. Dimension
MeasurementDimension.description: A measurable dimension (length, mass, weight, or volume) of this goods item.

ContainingPackage.title: Goods Item. Containing_ Package. Package
ContainingPackage.description: A package containing this goods item.

ShipmentDocumentReference.title: Goods Item. Shipment_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ShipmentDocumentReference.description: A reference to a shipping document associated with this goods item.

GoodsItemContainer.title: Goods Item Container. Details
GoodsItemContainer.description: A class defining how goods items are split across transport equipment.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Goods Item Container. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this goods item container.

Quantity.title: Goods Item Container. Quantity
Quantity.description: The number of goods items loaded into or onto one piece of transport equipment as a total consignment or part of a consignment.

TransportEquipment.title: Goods Item Container. Transport Equipment
TransportEquipment.description: A piece of transport equipment used to contain a single goods item.

HazardousGoodsTransit.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Details
HazardousGoodsTransit.description: A class to describe hazardous goods in transit.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

TransportEmergencyCardCode.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Transport Emergency Card Code. Code
TransportEmergencyCardCode.description: An identifier for a transport emergency card describing the actions to be taken in an emergency in transporting the hazardous goods. It may be the identity number of a hazardous emergency response plan assigned by the appropriate authority.

PackingCriteriaCode.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Packing Criteria Code. Code
PackingCriteriaCode.description: A code signifying the packaging requirement for transportation of the hazardous goods as assigned by IATA, IMDB, ADR, RID etc.

HazardousRegulationCode.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Hazardous Regulation Code. Code
HazardousRegulationCode.description: A code signifying the set of legal regulations governing the transportation of the hazardous goods.

InhalationToxicityZoneCode.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Inhalation Toxicity Zone Code. Code
InhalationToxicityZoneCode.description: A code signifying the Inhalation Toxicity Hazard Zone for the hazardous goods, as defined by the US Department of Transportation.

TransportAuthorizationCode.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Transport Authorization Code. Code
TransportAuthorizationCode.description: A code signifying authorization for the transportation of hazardous cargo.

MaximumTemperature.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Maximum_ Temperature. Temperature
MaximumTemperature.description: The maximum temperature at which the hazardous goods can safely be transported.

MinimumTemperature.title: Hazardous Goods Transit. Minimum_ Temperature. Temperature
MinimumTemperature.description: The minimum temperature at which the hazardous goods can safely be transported.

HazardousItem.title: Hazardous Item. Details
HazardousItem.description: A class to describe a hazardous item.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Hazardous Item. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this hazardous item.

PlacardNotation.title: Hazardous Item. Placard Notation. Text
PlacardNotation.description: Text of the placard notation corresponding to the hazard class of this hazardous item. Can also be the hazard identification number of the orange placard (upper part) required on the means of transport.

PlacardEndorsement.title: Hazardous Item. Placard Endorsement. Text
PlacardEndorsement.description: Text of the placard endorsement that is to be shown on the shipping papers for this hazardous item. Can also be used for the number of the orange placard (lower part) required on the means of transport.

AdditionalInformation.title: Hazardous Item. Additional_ Information. Text
AdditionalInformation.description: Text providing further information about the hazardous substance.

UNDGCode.title: Hazardous Item. UNDG Code. Code
UNDGCode.description: The UN code for this kind of hazardous item.

EmergencyProceduresCode.title: Hazardous Item. Emergency Procedures Code. Code
EmergencyProceduresCode.description: A code signifying the emergency procedures for this hazardous item.

MedicalFirstAidGuideCode.title: Hazardous Item. Medical First Aid Guide Code. Code
MedicalFirstAidGuideCode.description: A code signifying a medical first aid guide appropriate to this hazardous item.

TechnicalName.title: Hazardous Item. Technical_ Name. Name
TechnicalName.description: The full technical name of a specific hazardous substance contained in this goods item.

CategoryName.title: Hazardous Item. Category. Name
CategoryName.description: The name of the category of hazard that applies to the Item.

HazardousCategoryCode.title: Hazardous Item. Hazardous Category Code. Code
HazardousCategoryCode.description: A code signifying a kind of hazard for a material.

UpperOrangeHazardPlacardID.title: Hazardous Item. Upper_ Orange Hazard Placard Identifier. Identifier
UpperOrangeHazardPlacardID.description: The number for the upper part of the orange hazard placard required on the means of transport.

LowerOrangeHazardPlacardID.title: Hazardous Item. Lower_ Orange Hazard Placard Identifier. Identifier
LowerOrangeHazardPlacardID.description: The number for the lower part of the orange hazard placard required on the means of transport.

MarkingID.title: Hazardous Item. Marking Identifier. Identifier
MarkingID.description: An identifier to the marking of the Hazardous Item

HazardClassID.title: Hazardous Item. Hazard Class Identifier. Identifier
HazardClassID.description: An identifier for the hazard class applicable to this hazardous item as defined by the relevant regulation authority (e.g., the IMDG Class Number of the SOLAS Convention of IMO and the ADR/RID Class Number for the road/rail environment).

NetWeightMeasure.title: Hazardous Item. Net_ Weight. Measure
NetWeightMeasure.description: The net weight of this hazardous item, excluding packaging.

NetVolumeMeasure.title: Hazardous Item. Net_ Volume. Measure
NetVolumeMeasure.description: The volume of this hazardous item, excluding packaging and transport equipment.

Quantity.title: Hazardous Item. Quantity
Quantity.description: The quantity of goods items in this hazardous item that are hazardous.

ContactParty.title: Hazardous Item. Contact_ Party. Party
ContactParty.description: The individual, group, or body to be contacted in case of a hazardous incident associated with this item.

SecondaryHazard.title: Hazardous Item. Secondary Hazard
SecondaryHazard.description: A secondary hazard associated with this hazardous item.

HazardousGoodsTransit.title: Hazardous Item. Hazardous Goods Transit
HazardousGoodsTransit.description: Information related to the transit of this kind of hazardous goods.

EmergencyTemperature.title: Hazardous Item. Emergency_ Temperature. Temperature
EmergencyTemperature.description: The threshold temperature at which emergency procedures apply in the handling of temperature-controlled goods.

FlashpointTemperature.title: Hazardous Item. Flashpoint_ Temperature. Temperature
FlashpointTemperature.description: The flashpoint temperature of this hazardous item; i.e., the lowest temperature at which vapors above a volatile combustible substance ignite in air when exposed to flame.

AdditionalTemperature.title: Hazardous Item. Additional_ Temperature. Temperature
AdditionalTemperature.description: Another temperature relevant to the handling of this hazardous item.

InvoiceLine.title: Invoice Line. Details
InvoiceLine.description: A class to define a line in an Invoice.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Invoice Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this invoice line.

UUID.title: Invoice Line. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for this invoice line.

Note.title: Invoice Line. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

InvoicedQuantity.title: Invoice Line. Invoiced_ Quantity. Quantity
InvoicedQuantity.description: The quantity (of items) on this invoice line.

LineExtensionAmount.title: Invoice Line. Line Extension Amount. Amount
LineExtensionAmount.description: The total amount for this invoice line, including allowance charges but net of taxes.

TaxInclusiveLineExtensionAmount.title: Invoice Line. Tax Inclusive_ Line Extension Amount. Amount
TaxInclusiveLineExtensionAmount.description: The total amount for this invoice line, including all allowances, charges and taxes.

TaxPointDate.title: Invoice Line. Tax Point Date. Date
TaxPointDate.description: The date of this invoice line, used to indicate the point at which tax becomes applicable.

AccountingCostCode.title: Invoice Line. Accounting Cost Code. Code
AccountingCostCode.description: The buyer's accounting cost centre for this invoice line, expressed as a code.

AccountingCost.title: Invoice Line. Accounting Cost. Text
AccountingCost.description: The buyer's accounting cost centre for this invoice line, expressed as text.

PaymentPurposeCode.title: Invoice Line. Payment Purpose Code. Code
PaymentPurposeCode.description: A code signifying the business purpose for this payment.

FreeOfChargeIndicator.title: Invoice Line. Free Of Charge_ Indicator. Indicator
FreeOfChargeIndicator.description: An indicator that this invoice line is free of charge (true) or not (false). The default is false.

InvoicePeriod.title: Invoice Line. Invoice_ Period. Period
InvoicePeriod.description: An invoice period to which this invoice line applies.

OrderLineReference.title: Invoice Line. Order Line Reference
OrderLineReference.description: A reference to an order line associated with this invoice line.

DespatchLineReference.title: Invoice Line. Despatch_ Line Reference. Line Reference
DespatchLineReference.description: A reference to a despatch line associated with this invoice line.

ReceiptLineReference.title: Invoice Line. Receipt_ Line Reference. Line Reference
ReceiptLineReference.description: A reference to a receipt line associated with this invoice line.

BillingReference.title: Invoice Line. Billing Reference
BillingReference.description: A reference to a billing document associated with this invoice line.

DocumentReference.title: Invoice Line. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to a document associated with this invoice line.

PricingReference.title: Invoice Line. Pricing Reference
PricingReference.description: A reference to pricing and item location information associated with this invoice line.

OriginatorParty.title: Invoice Line. Originator_ Party. Party
OriginatorParty.description: The party who originated the Order to which the Invoice is related.

Delivery.title: Invoice Line. Delivery
Delivery.description: A delivery associated with this invoice line.

PaymentTerms.title: Invoice Line. Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.description: A specification of payment terms associated with this invoice line.

AllowanceCharge.title: Invoice Line. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: An allowance or charge associated with this invoice line.

TaxTotal.title: Invoice Line. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: A total amount of taxes of a particular kind applicable to this invoice line.

WithholdingTaxTotal.title: Invoice Line. Withholding_ Tax Total. Tax Total
WithholdingTaxTotal.description: A reference to a TaxTotal class describing the amount that has been withhold by the authorities, e.g. if the creditor is in dept because of non paid taxes.

Item.title: Invoice Line. Item
Item.description: The item associated with this invoice line.

Price.title: Invoice Line. Price
Price.description: The price of the item associated with this invoice line.

DeliveryTerms.title: Invoice Line. Delivery Terms
DeliveryTerms.description: Terms and conditions of the delivery associated with this invoice line.

SubInvoiceLine.title: Invoice Line. Sub_ Invoice Line. Invoice Line
SubInvoiceLine.description: An invoice line subsidiary to this invoice line.

ItemPriceExtension.title: Invoice Line. Item_ Price Extension. Price Extension
ItemPriceExtension.description: The price extension, calculated by multiplying the price per unit by the quantity of items on this invoice line.

Item.title: Item. Details
Item.description: A class to describe an item of trade. It includes a generic description applicable to all examples of the item together with optional subsidiary descriptions of any number of actual instances of the type.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

PackQuantity.title: Item. Pack Quantity. Quantity
PackQuantity.description: The unit packaging quantity; the number of subunits making up this item.

PackSizeNumeric.title: Item. Pack Size. Numeric
PackSizeNumeric.description: The number of items in a pack of this item.

CatalogueIndicator.title: Item. Catalogue_ Indicator. Indicator
CatalogueIndicator.description: An indicator that this item was ordered from a catalogue (true) or not (false).

Name.title: Item. Name
Name.description: A short name optionally given to this item, such as a name from a catalogue, as distinct from a description.

HazardousRiskIndicator.title: Item. Hazardous Risk_ Indicator. Indicator
HazardousRiskIndicator.description: An indication that the transported item, as delivered, is subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

AdditionalInformation.title: Item. Additional_ Information. Text
AdditionalInformation.description: Further details regarding this item (e.g., the URL of a relevant web page).

Keyword.title: Item. Keyword. Text
Keyword.description: A keyword (search string) for this item, assigned by the seller party. Can also be a synonym for the name of the item.

BrandName.title: Item. Brand Name. Name
BrandName.description: A brand name of this item.

ModelName.title: Item. Model Name. Name
ModelName.description: A model name of this item.

BuyersItemIdentification.title: Item. Buyers_ Item Identification. Item Identification
BuyersItemIdentification.description: Identifying information for this item, assigned by the buyer.

SellersItemIdentification.title: Item. Sellers_ Item Identification. Item Identification
SellersItemIdentification.description: Identifying information for this item, assigned by the seller.

ManufacturersItemIdentification.title: Item. Manufacturers_ Item Identification. Item Identification
ManufacturersItemIdentification.description: Identifying information for this item, assigned by the manufacturer.

StandardItemIdentification.title: Item. Standard_ Item Identification. Item Identification
StandardItemIdentification.description: Identifying information for this item, assigned according to a standard system.

CatalogueItemIdentification.title: Item. Catalogue_ Item Identification. Item Identification
CatalogueItemIdentification.description: Identifying information for this item, assigned according to a cataloguing system.

AdditionalItemIdentification.title: Item. Additional_ Item Identification. Item Identification
AdditionalItemIdentification.description: An additional identifier for this item.

CatalogueDocumentReference.title: Item. Catalogue_ Document Reference. Document Reference
CatalogueDocumentReference.description: A reference to the catalogue in which this item appears.

ItemSpecificationDocumentReference.title: Item. Item Specification_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ItemSpecificationDocumentReference.description: A reference to a specification document for this item.

OriginCountry.title: Item. Origin_ Country. Country
OriginCountry.description: The country of origin of this item.

CommodityClassification.title: Item. Commodity Classification
CommodityClassification.description: A classification of this item according to a specific system for classifying commodities.

TransactionConditions.title: Item. Transaction Conditions
TransactionConditions.description: A set of sales conditions applying to this item.

HazardousItem.title: Item. Hazardous Item
HazardousItem.description: Information pertaining to this item as a hazardous item.

ClassifiedTaxCategory.title: Item. Classified_ Tax Category. Tax Category
ClassifiedTaxCategory.description: A tax category applicable to this item.

AdditionalItemProperty.title: Item. Additional_ Item Property. Item Property
AdditionalItemProperty.description: An additional property of this item.

InformationContentProviderParty.title: Item. Information Content Provider_ Party. Party
InformationContentProviderParty.description: The party responsible for specification of this item.

OriginAddress.title: Item. Origin_ Address. Address
OriginAddress.description: A region (not country) of origin of this item.

ItemInstance.title: Item. Item Instance
ItemInstance.description: A trackable, unique instantiation of this item.

Certificate.title: Item. Certificate
Certificate.description: A certificate associated with this item.

Dimension.title: Item. Dimension
Dimension.description: One of the measurable dimensions (length, mass, weight, or volume) of this item.

ItemIdentification.title: Item Identification. Details
ItemIdentification.description: A class for assigning identifying information to an item.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Item Identification. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for the item.

ExtendedID.title: Item Identification. Extended_ Identifier. Identifier
ExtendedID.description: An extended identifier for the item that identifies the item with specific properties, e.g., Item 123 = Chair / Item 123 Ext 45 = brown chair. Two chairs can have the same item number, but one is brown. The other is white.

BarcodeSymbologyID.title: Item Identification. Barcode_ Symbology Identifier. Identifier
BarcodeSymbologyID.description: An identifier for a system of barcodes.

IssuerScopeID.title: Item Identification. Issuer_ Scope Identifier. Identifier
IssuerScopeID.description: A scope within which the issuer has assigned this identifier.

PhysicalAttribute.title: Item Identification. Physical Attribute
PhysicalAttribute.description: A physical attribute of the item.

MeasurementDimension.title: Item Identification. Measurement_ Dimension. Dimension
MeasurementDimension.description: A measurable dimension (length, mass, weight, or volume) of the item.

IssuerParty.title: Item Identification. Issuer_ Party. Party
IssuerParty.description: The party that issued this item identification.

ItemInstance.title: Item Instance. Details
ItemInstance.description: A class to describe a specific, trackable instance of an item.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ProductTraceID.title: Item Instance. Product Trace_ Identifier. Identifier
ProductTraceID.description: An identifier used for tracing this item instance, such as the EPC number used in RFID.

ManufactureDate.title: Item Instance. Manufacture Date. Date
ManufactureDate.description: The date on which this item instance was manufactured.

ManufactureTime.title: Item Instance. Manufacture Time. Time
ManufactureTime.description: The time at which this item instance was manufactured.

BestBeforeDate.title: Item Instance. Best Before Date. Date
BestBeforeDate.description: The date before which it is best to use this item instance.

RegistrationID.title: Item Instance. Registration Identifier. Identifier
RegistrationID.description: The registration identifier of this item instance.

SerialID.title: Item Instance. Serial Identifier. Identifier
SerialID.description: The serial number of this item instance.

AdditionalItemProperty.title: Item Instance. Additional_ Item Property. Item Property
AdditionalItemProperty.description: An additional property of this item instance.

LotIdentification.title: Item Instance. Lot Identification
LotIdentification.description: The lot identifier of this item instance (the identifier that allows recall of the item if necessary).

ItemLocationQuantity.title: Item Location Quantity. Details
ItemLocationQuantity.description: A class for information about pricing structure, lead time, and location associated with an item.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

LeadTimeMeasure.title: Item Location Quantity. Lead Time. Measure
LeadTimeMeasure.description: The lead time, i.e., the time taken from the time at which an item is ordered to the time of its delivery.

MinimumQuantity.title: Item Location Quantity. Minimum_ Quantity. Quantity
MinimumQuantity.description: The minimum quantity that can be ordered to qualify for a specific price.

MaximumQuantity.title: Item Location Quantity. Maximum_ Quantity. Quantity
MaximumQuantity.description: The maximum quantity that can be ordered to qualify for a specific price.

HazardousRiskIndicator.title: Item Location Quantity. Hazardous Risk_ Indicator. Indicator
HazardousRiskIndicator.description: An indication that the transported item, as delivered, in the stated quantity to the stated location, is subject to an international regulation concerning the carriage of dangerous goods (true) or not (false).

TradingRestrictions.title: Item Location Quantity. Trading Restrictions. Text
TradingRestrictions.description: Text describing trade restrictions on the quantity of this item or on the item itself.

ApplicableTerritoryAddress.title: Item Location Quantity. Applicable Territory_ Address. Address

Price.title: Item Location Quantity. Price
Price.description: The price associated with the given location.

DeliveryUnit.title: Item Location Quantity. Delivery Unit
DeliveryUnit.description: A delivery unit in which the item is located.

ApplicableTaxCategory.title: Item Location Quantity. Applicable_ Tax Category. Tax Category

UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Person. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this person.

Title.title: Person. Title. Text
Title.description: This person's title of address (e.g., Mr, Ms, Dr, Sir).

MiddleName.title: Person. Middle_ Name. Name
MiddleName.description: This person's middle name(s) or initials.

NameSuffix.title: Person. Name Suffix. Text
NameSuffix.description: A suffix to this person's name (e.g., PhD, OBE, Jr).

JobTitle.title: Person. Job Title. Text
JobTitle.description: This person's job title (for a particular role) within an organization.

NationalityID.title: Person. Nationality. Identifier
NationalityID.description: An identifier for this person's nationality.

GenderCode.title: Person. Gender Code. Code
GenderCode.description: A code (e.g., ISO 5218) signifying the gender of this person.

BirthplaceName.title: Person. Birthplace Name. Name
BirthplaceName.description: The name of the place where this person was born, expressed as text.

OrganizationDepartment.title: Person. Organization_ Department. Text
OrganizationDepartment.description: The department or subdivision of an organization that this person belongs to (in a particular role).

RoleCode.title: Person. Role Code. Code
RoleCode.description: A code stating the person's role

CitizenshipCountry.title: Person. Citizenship_ Country. Country
CitizenshipCountry.description: The country of the person's citizenship.

FinancialAccount.title: Person. Financial Account
FinancialAccount.description: The financial account associated with this person.

IdentityDocumentReference.title: Person. Identity_ Document Reference. Document Reference
IdentityDocumentReference.description: A reference to a document that can precisely identify this person (e.g., a driver's license).

PhysicalAttribute.title: Physical Attribute. Details
PhysicalAttribute.description: A class to describe a physical attribute.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

AttributeID.title: Physical Attribute. Attribute Identifier. Identifier
AttributeID.description: An identifier for this physical attribute.

PositionCode.title: Physical Attribute. Position Code. Code
PositionCode.description: A code signifying the position of this physical attribute.

DescriptionCode.title: Physical Attribute. Description Code. Code
DescriptionCode.description: A description of the physical attribute, expressed as a code.

Description.title: Physical Attribute. Description. Text
Description.description: A description of the physical attribute, expressed as text.

Pickup.title: Pickup. Details
Pickup.description: A class to describe a pickup for delivery.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Pickup. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this pickup.

PickupParty.title: Pickup. Pickup_ Party. Party
PickupParty.description: The party responsible for picking up a delivery.

PowerOfAttorney.title: Power Of Attorney. Details
PowerOfAttorney.description: A class to describe a power of attorney.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Power Of Attorney. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this power of attorney.

IssueDate.title: Power Of Attorney. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date on which this power of attorney was issued.

IssueTime.title: Power Of Attorney. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time at which this power of attorney was issued.

Description.title: Power Of Attorney. Description. Text
Description.description: Text describing this power of attorney.

NotaryParty.title: Power Of Attorney. Notary_ Party. Party
NotaryParty.description: The party notarizing this power of attorney.

AgentParty.title: Power Of Attorney. Agent_ Party. Party
AgentParty.description: The party who acts as an agent or fiduciary for the principal and who holds this power of attorney on behalf of the principal.

WitnessParty.title: Power Of Attorney. Witness_ Party. Party

MandateDocumentReference.title: Power Of Attorney. Mandate_ Document Reference. Document Reference
MandateDocumentReference.description: A reference to a mandate associated with this power of attorney.

Price.title: Price. Details
Price.description: A class to describe a price, expressed in a data structure containing multiple properties (compare with UnstructuredPrice).

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

BaseQuantity.title: Price. Base_ Quantity. Quantity
BaseQuantity.description: The quantity at which this price applies.

PriceChangeReason.title: Price. Price Change_ Reason. Text
PriceChangeReason.description: A reason for a price change.

PriceTypeCode.title: Price. Price Type Code. Code
PriceTypeCode.description: The type of price, expressed as a code.

PriceType.title: Price. Price Type. Text
PriceType.description: The type of price, expressed as text.

OrderableUnitFactorRate.title: Price. Orderable Unit Factor. Rate
OrderableUnitFactorRate.description: The factor by which the base price unit can be converted to the orderable unit.

ValidityPeriod.title: Price. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: A period during which this price is valid.

PriceList.title: Price. Price List
PriceList.description: Information about a price list applicable to this price.

AllowanceCharge.title: Price. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: An allowance or charge associated with this price.

PricingExchangeRate.title: Price. Pricing_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PricingExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate applicable to this price, if it differs from the exchange rate applicable to the document as a whole.

AlternativeCurrencyPrice.title: Price. Alternative Currency_ Price. Price
AlternativeCurrencyPrice.description: The price expressed in an alternative currency

PriceExtension.title: Price Extension. Details
PriceExtension.description: A class to describe a price extension, calculated by multiplying the price per unit by the quantity of items.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

Amount.title: Price Extension. Amount
Amount.description: The amount of this price extension.

TaxTotal.title: Price Extension. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: A total amount of taxes of a particular kind applicable to this price extension.

PriceList.title: Price List. Details
PriceList.description: A class to describe a price list.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Price List. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this price list.

StatusCode.title: Price List. Status Code. Code
StatusCode.description: A code signifying whether this price list is an original, copy, revision, or cancellation.

ValidityPeriod.title: Price List. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: A period during which this price list is valid.

PreviousPriceList.title: Price List. Previous_ Price List. Price List

PricingReference.title: Pricing Reference. Details
PricingReference.description: A reference to the basis for pricing. This may be based on a catalogue or a quoted amount from a price list and include some alternative pricing conditions.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

OriginalItemLocationQuantity.title: Pricing Reference. Original_ Item Location Quantity. Item Location Quantity
OriginalItemLocationQuantity.description: An original set of location-specific properties (e.g., price and quantity) associated with this item.

AlternativeConditionPrice.title: Pricing Reference. Alternative Condition_ Price. Price
AlternativeConditionPrice.description: The price expressed in terms other than the actual price, e.g., the list price v. the contracted price, or the price in bags v. the price in kilos, or the list price in bags v. the contracted price in kilos.

ProjectReference.title: Project Reference. Details
ProjectReference.description: A class to define a reference to a procurement project.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Project Reference. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for the referenced project.

UUID.title: Project Reference. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for the referenced project.

IssueDate.title: Project Reference. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date on which the referenced project was issued.

WorkPhaseReference.title: Project Reference. Work Phase Reference
WorkPhaseReference.description: A specific phase of work in the referenced project.

PropertyIdentification.title: Property Identification. Details
PropertyIdentification.description: A class for assigning identifying information for a property

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Property Identification. Identifier
ID.description: An Identifier for the property.

IssuerScopeID.title: Property Identification. Issuer_ Scope Identifier. Identifier
IssuerScopeID.description: A scope within which the issuer has assigned this identifier.

IssuerParty.title: Property Identification. Issuer_ Party. Party
IssuerParty.description: The party that issued this property identifier.

RailTransport.title: Rail Transport. Details
RailTransport.description: A class defining details about a train wagon used as a means of transport.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

TrainID.title: Rail Transport. Train Identifier. Identifier
TrainID.description: An identifier for the train used as the means of transport.

RailCarID.title: Rail Transport. Rail Car Identifier. Identifier
RailCarID.description: An identifier for the rail car on the train used as the means of transport.

ReceiptLine.title: Receipt Line. Details
ReceiptLine.description: A class to define a line in a Receipt Advice.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Receipt Line. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this receipt line.

UUID.title: Receipt Line. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for this receipt line.

Note.title: Receipt Line. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

ShortQuantity.title: Receipt Line. Short_ Quantity. Quantity
ShortQuantity.description: The quantity received short; the difference between the quantity reported despatched and the quantity actually received.

ShortageActionCode.title: Receipt Line. Shortage Action Code. Code
ShortageActionCode.description: A code signifying the action that the delivery party wishes the despatch party to take as the result of a shortage.

RejectReasonCode.title: Receipt Line. Reject Reason Code. Code
RejectReasonCode.description: The reason for a rejection, expressed as a code.

RejectReason.title: Receipt Line. Reject_ Reason. Text
RejectReason.description: The reason for a rejection, expressed as text.

RejectActionCode.title: Receipt Line. Reject Action Code. Code
RejectActionCode.description: A code signifying the action that the delivery party wishes the despatch party to take as the result of a rejection.

QuantityDiscrepancyCode.title: Receipt Line. Quantity Discrepancy Code. Code
QuantityDiscrepancyCode.description: A code signifying the type of a discrepancy in quantity.

OversupplyQuantity.title: Receipt Line. Oversupply_ Quantity. Quantity
OversupplyQuantity.description: The quantity over-supplied, i.e., the quantity over and above the quantity ordered.

ReceivedDate.title: Receipt Line. Received_ Date. Date
ReceivedDate.description: The date on which the goods or services were received.

TimingComplaintCode.title: Receipt Line. Timing Complaint Code. Code
TimingComplaintCode.description: A complaint about the timing of delivery, expressed as a code.

TimingComplaint.title: Receipt Line. Timing Complaint. Text
TimingComplaint.description: A complaint about the timing of delivery, expressed as text.

OrderLineReference.title: Receipt Line. Order Line Reference
OrderLineReference.description: A reference to the order line associated with this receipt line.

DespatchLineReference.title: Receipt Line. Despatch_ Line Reference. Line Reference
DespatchLineReference.description: A reference to a despatch line associated with this receipt line.

DocumentReference.title: Receipt Line. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to a document associated with this receipt line.

Item.title: Receipt Line. Item
Item.description: An item associated with this receipt line.

Shipment.title: Receipt Line. Shipment
Shipment.description: A shipment associated with this receipt line.

Response.title: Response. Details
Response.description: A class to describe an application-level response to a document.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ReferenceID.title: Response. Reference. Identifier
ReferenceID.description: An identifier for the section (or line) of the document to which this response applies.

ResponseCode.title: Response. Response Code. Code
ResponseCode.description: A code signifying the type of response.

EffectiveDate.title: Response. Effective Date. Date
EffectiveDate.description: The date upon which this response is valid.

EffectiveTime.title: Response. Effective Time. Time
EffectiveTime.description: The time at which this response is valid.

Status.title: Response. Status
Status.description: A status report associated with this response.

ValidatorID.description: An identifier for the organization, person, service, or server that verified the signature.

ValidationResultCode.title: Result Of Verification. Validation_ Result Code. Code
ValidationResultCode.description: A code signifying the result of the verification.

ValidationDate.title: Result Of Verification. Validation Date. Date
ValidationDate.description: The date upon which verification took place.

ValidationTime.title: Result Of Verification. Validation Time. Time
ValidationTime.description: The time at which verification took place.

ValidateProcess.title: Result Of Verification. Validate_ Process. Text

ValidateTool.title: Result Of Verification. Validate_ Tool. Text
ValidateTool.description: The tool used to verify the signature.

ValidateToolVersion.title: Result Of Verification. Validate_ Tool Version. Text
ValidateToolVersion.description: The version of the tool used to verify the signature.

SignatoryParty.title: Result Of Verification. Signatory_ Party. Party

RoadTransport.title: Road Transport. Details
RoadTransport.description: A class for identifying a vehicle used for road transport.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

LicensePlateID.title: Road Transport. License Plate Identifier. Identifier
LicensePlateID.description: The license plate identifier of this vehicle.

SecondaryHazard.title: Secondary Hazard. Details
SecondaryHazard.description: A class to describe a secondary hazard associated with a hazardous item.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Secondary Hazard. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this secondary hazard.

PlacardNotation.title: Secondary Hazard. Placard Notation. Text
PlacardNotation.description: Text of the placard notation corresponding to the hazard class of this secondary hazard. Can also be the hazard identification number of the orange placard (upper part) required on the means of transport.

PlacardEndorsement.title: Secondary Hazard. Placard Endorsement. Text
PlacardEndorsement.description: Text of the placard endorsement for this secondary hazard that is to be shown on the shipping papers for a hazardous item. Can also be used for the number of the orange placard (lower part) required on the means of transport.

EmergencyProceduresCode.title: Secondary Hazard. Emergency Procedures Code. Code
EmergencyProceduresCode.description: A code signifying the emergency procedures for this secondary hazard.

Extension.title: Secondary Hazard. Extension. Text
Extension.description: Additional information about the hazardous substance, which can be used (for example) to specify the type of regulatory requirements that apply to this secondary hazard.

ServiceFrequency.title: Service Frequency. Details
ServiceFrequency.description: A class to specify which day of the week a transport service is operational.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

WeekDayCode.title: Service Frequency. Week Day. Code
WeekDayCode.description: A day of the week, expressed as code.

ServiceProviderParty.title: Service Provider Party. Details
ServiceProviderParty.description: A class to describe a party contracting to provide services, such as transportation, finance, etc.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Service Provider Party. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this service provider.

ServiceTypeCode.title: Service Provider Party. Service Type Code. Code
ServiceTypeCode.description: The type of service provided, expressed as a code.

ServiceType.title: Service Provider Party. Service Type. Text
ServiceType.description: The type of service provided, expressed as text.

SellerContact.title: Service Provider Party. Seller_ Contact. Contact
SellerContact.description: The contact for the service provider.

ShareholderParty.title: Shareholder Party. Details
ShareholderParty.description: A class to describe a shareholder party.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

PartecipationPercent.title: Shareholder Party. Partecipation. Percent
PartecipationPercent.description: The shareholder participation, expressed as a percentage.

Shipment.title: Shipment. Details
Shipment.description: A class defining an identifiable collection of one or more goods items to be transported between the seller party and the buyer party. This information may be defined within a commercial contract. A shipment can be transported in different consignments (e.g., split for logistical purposes).

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Shipment. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this shipment.

ShippingPriorityLevelCode.title: Shipment. Shipping Priority Level Code. Code
ShippingPriorityLevelCode.description: A code signifying the priority or level of service required for this shipment.

HandlingCode.title: Shipment. Handling Code. Code
HandlingCode.description: The handling required for this shipment, expressed as a code.

HandlingInstructions.title: Shipment. Handling_ Instructions. Text
HandlingInstructions.description: The handling required for this shipment, expressed as text.

Information.title: Shipment. Information. Text
Information.description: Free-form text pertinent to this shipment, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

GrossWeightMeasure.title: Shipment. Gross_ Weight. Measure
GrossWeightMeasure.description: The total gross weight of a shipment; the weight of the goods plus packaging plus transport equipment.

NetWeightMeasure.title: Shipment. Net_ Weight. Measure
NetWeightMeasure.description: The net weight of this shipment, excluding packaging.

NetNetWeightMeasure.title: Shipment. Net Net_ Weight. Measure
NetNetWeightMeasure.description: The total net weight of this shipment, excluding packaging and transport equipment.

GrossVolumeMeasure.title: Shipment. Gross_ Volume. Measure
GrossVolumeMeasure.description: The total volume of the goods in this shipment, including packaging.

NetVolumeMeasure.title: Shipment. Net_ Volume. Measure
NetVolumeMeasure.description: The total volume of the goods in this shipment, excluding packaging and transport equipment.

TotalGoodsItemQuantity.title: Shipment. Total_ Goods Item Quantity. Quantity
TotalGoodsItemQuantity.description: The total number of goods items in this shipment.

TotalTransportHandlingUnitQuantity.title: Shipment. Total_ Transport Handling Unit Quantity. Quantity
TotalTransportHandlingUnitQuantity.description: The number of pieces of transport handling equipment (pallets, boxes, cases, etc.) in this shipment.

InsuranceValueAmount.title: Shipment. Insurance_ Value. Amount
InsuranceValueAmount.description: The amount covered by insurance for this shipment.

DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.title: Shipment. Declared Customs_ Value. Amount
DeclaredCustomsValueAmount.description: The total declared value for customs purposes of those goods in this shipment that are subject to the same customs procedure and have the same tariff/statistical heading, country information, and duty regime.

DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.title: Shipment. Declared For Carriage_ Value. Amount
DeclaredForCarriageValueAmount.description: The value of this shipment, declared by the shipper or his agent solely for the purpose of varying the carrier's level of liability from that provided in the contract of carriage, in case of loss or damage to goods or delayed delivery.

DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.title: Shipment. Declared Statistics_ Value. Amount
DeclaredStatisticsValueAmount.description: The value, declared for statistical purposes, of those goods in this shipment that have the same statistical heading.

FreeOnBoardValueAmount.title: Shipment. Free On Board_ Value. Amount
FreeOnBoardValueAmount.description: The monetary amount that has to be or has been paid as calculated under the applicable trade delivery.

SpecialInstructions.title: Shipment. Special_ Instructions. Text
SpecialInstructions.description: Special instructions relating to this shipment.

DeliveryInstructions.title: Shipment. Delivery_ Instructions. Text
DeliveryInstructions.description: Delivery instructions relating to this shipment.

SplitConsignmentIndicator.title: Shipment. Split Consignment_ Indicator. Indicator
SplitConsignmentIndicator.description: An indicator that the consignment has been split in transit (true) or not (false).

ConsignmentQuantity.title: Shipment. Consignment_ Quantity. Quantity
ConsignmentQuantity.description: The total number of consignments within this shipment.

GoodsItem.title: Shipment. Goods Item
GoodsItem.description: A goods item included in this shipment.

ShipmentStage.title: Shipment. Shipment Stage
ShipmentStage.description: A stage in the transport movement of this shipment.

TransportHandlingUnit.title: Shipment. Transport Handling Unit
TransportHandlingUnit.description: A transport handling unit associated with this shipment.

ReturnAddress.title: Shipment. Return_ Address. Address
ReturnAddress.description: The address to which a shipment should be returned.

OriginAddress.title: Shipment. Origin_ Address. Address
OriginAddress.description: The region in which the goods have been produced or manufactured, according to criteria laid down for the purposes of application of the customs tariff, or of quantitative restrictions, or of any other measure related to trade.

FirstArrivalPortLocation.title: Shipment. First Arrival Port_ Location. Location
FirstArrivalPortLocation.description: The first arrival location of a shipment. This would be a port for sea, an airport for air, a terminal for rail, or a border post for land crossing.

LastExitPortLocation.title: Shipment. Last Exit Port_ Location. Location
LastExitPortLocation.description: The final exporting location for a shipment. This would be a port for sea, an airport for air, a terminal for rail, or a border post for land crossing.

ExportCountry.title: Shipment. Export_ Country. Country
ExportCountry.description: The country from which the goods were originally exported, without any commercial transaction taking place in intermediate countries.

FreightAllowanceCharge.title: Shipment. Freight_ Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge
FreightAllowanceCharge.description: A cost incurred by the shipper in moving goods, by whatever means, from one place to another under the terms of the contract of carriage. In addition to transport costs, this may include such elements as packing, documentation, loading, unloading, and insurance to the extent that they relate to the freight costs.

ShipmentStage.title: Shipment Stage. Details
ShipmentStage.description: A class to describe one stage of movement in a transport of goods.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

ID.title: Shipment Stage. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this shipment stage.

TransportModeCode.title: Shipment Stage. Transport Mode Code. Code
TransportModeCode.description: A code signifying the method of transport used for this shipment stage.

TransportMeansTypeCode.title: Shipment Stage. Transport Means Type Code. Code
TransportMeansTypeCode.description: A code signifying the kind of transport means (truck, vessel, etc.) used for this shipment stage.

TransitDirectionCode.title: Shipment Stage. Transit_ Direction Code. Code
TransitDirectionCode.description: A code signifying the direction of transit in this shipment stage.

PreCarriageIndicator.title: Shipment Stage. Pre Carriage_ Indicator. Indicator
PreCarriageIndicator.description: An indicator that this stage takes place before the main carriage of the shipment (true) or not (false).

OnCarriageIndicator.title: Shipment Stage. On Carriage_ Indicator. Indicator
OnCarriageIndicator.description: An indicator that this stage takes place after the main carriage of the shipment (true) or not (false).

EstimatedDeliveryDate.title: Shipment Stage. Estimated_ Delivery Date. Date
EstimatedDeliveryDate.description: The estimated date of delivery in this shipment stage.

EstimatedDeliveryTime.title: Shipment Stage. Estimated_ Delivery Time. Time
EstimatedDeliveryTime.description: The estimated time of delivery in this shipment stage.

RequiredDeliveryDate.title: Shipment Stage. Required_ Delivery Date. Date
RequiredDeliveryDate.description: The delivery date required by the buyer in this shipment stage.

RequiredDeliveryTime.title: Shipment Stage. Required_ Delivery Time. Time
RequiredDeliveryTime.description: The delivery time required by the buyer in this shipment stage.

LoadingSequenceID.title: Shipment Stage. Loading_ Sequence Identifier. Identifier
LoadingSequenceID.description: An identifier for the loading sequence (of consignments) associated with this shipment stage.

SuccessiveSequenceID.title: Shipment Stage. Successive_ Sequence Identifier. Identifier
SuccessiveSequenceID.description: Identifies the successive loading sequence (of consignments) associated with a shipment stage.

Instructions.title: Shipment Stage. Instructions. Text
Instructions.description: Text of instructions applicable to a shipment stage.

DemurrageInstructions.title: Shipment Stage. Demurrage_ Instructions. Text
DemurrageInstructions.description: Text of instructions relating to demurrage (the case in which a vessel is prevented from loading or discharging cargo within the stipulated laytime).

CrewQuantity.title: Shipment Stage. Crew Quantity. Quantity
CrewQuantity.description: The total number of crew aboard a transport means.

PassengerQuantity.title: Shipment Stage. Passenger Quantity. Quantity
PassengerQuantity.description: The total number of passengers aboard a transport means.

TransitPeriod.title: Shipment Stage. Transit_ Period. Period
TransitPeriod.description: The period during which this shipment stage actually took place.

CarrierParty.title: Shipment Stage. Carrier_ Party. Party
CarrierParty.description: A carrier party responsible for this shipment stage.

TransportMeans.title: Shipment Stage. Transport Means
TransportMeans.description: The means of transport used in this shipment stage.

LoadingPortLocation.title: Shipment Stage. Loading Port_ Location. Location
LoadingPortLocation.description: The location of loading for a shipment stage.

UnloadingPortLocation.title: Shipment Stage. Unloading Port_ Location. Location
UnloadingPortLocation.description: The location of unloading for a shipment stage.

TransshipPortLocation.title: Shipment Stage. Transship Port_ Location. Location
TransshipPortLocation.description: The location of transshipment relating to a shipment stage.

LoadingTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Loading_ Transport Event. Transport Event
LoadingTransportEvent.description: The loading of goods in this shipment stage.

ExaminationTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Examination_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ExaminationTransportEvent.description: The examination of shipments in this shipment stage.

AvailabilityTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Availability_ Transport Event. Transport Event
AvailabilityTransportEvent.description: The making available of shipments in this shipment stage.

ExportationTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Exportation_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ExportationTransportEvent.description: The export event associated with this shipment stage.

DischargeTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Discharge_ Transport Event. Transport Event
DischargeTransportEvent.description: The discharge event associated with this shipment stage.

WarehousingTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Warehousing_ Transport Event. Transport Event
WarehousingTransportEvent.description: The warehousing event associated with this shipment stage.

TakeoverTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Takeover_ Transport Event. Transport Event
TakeoverTransportEvent.description: The receiver's takeover of the goods in this shipment stage.

OptionalTakeoverTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Optional Takeover_ Transport Event. Transport Event
OptionalTakeoverTransportEvent.description: The optional takeover of the goods in this shipment stage.

DropoffTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Dropoff_ Transport Event. Transport Event
DropoffTransportEvent.description: The dropping off of goods in this shipment stage.

ActualPickupTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Actual Pickup_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ActualPickupTransportEvent.description: The pickup of goods in this shipment stage.

DeliveryTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Delivery_ Transport Event. Transport Event
DeliveryTransportEvent.description: The delivery of goods in this shipment stage.

ReceiptTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Receipt_ Transport Event. Transport Event
ReceiptTransportEvent.description: The receipt of goods in this shipment stage.

StorageTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Storage_ Transport Event. Transport Event
StorageTransportEvent.description: The storage of goods in this shipment stage.

AcceptanceTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Acceptance_ Transport Event. Transport Event
AcceptanceTransportEvent.description: The acceptance of goods in this shipment stage.

TerminalOperatorParty.title: Shipment Stage. Terminal Operator_ Party. Party
TerminalOperatorParty.description: A terminal operator associated with this shipment stage.

CustomsAgentParty.title: Shipment Stage. Customs Agent_ Party. Party
CustomsAgentParty.description: A customs agent associated with this shipment stage.

EstimatedTransitPeriod.title: Shipment Stage. Estimated Transit_ Period. Period
EstimatedTransitPeriod.description: The estimated transit period of this shipment stage.

FreightAllowanceCharge.title: Shipment Stage. Freight_ Allowance Charge. Allowance Charge
FreightAllowanceCharge.description: A freight allowance charge for this shipment stage.

FreightChargeLocation.title: Shipment Stage. Freight Charge_ Location. Location
FreightChargeLocation.description: The location associated with a freight charge related to this shipment stage.

DetentionTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Detention_ Transport Event. Transport Event
DetentionTransportEvent.description: The detention of a transport means during loading and unloading operations.

RequestedDepartureTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Requested Departure_ Transport Event. Transport Event
RequestedDepartureTransportEvent.description: The departure requested by the party requesting a transportation service.

RequestedArrivalTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Requested Arrival_ Transport Event. Transport Event
RequestedArrivalTransportEvent.description: The arrival requested by the party requesting a transportation service.

RequestedWaypointTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Requested Waypoint_ Transport Event. Transport Event
RequestedWaypointTransportEvent.description: A waypoint requested by the party requesting a transportation service.

PlannedDepartureTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Planned Departure_ Transport Event. Transport Event
PlannedDepartureTransportEvent.description: The departure planned by the party providing a transportation service.

PlannedArrivalTransportEvent.title: Shipment Stage. Planned Arrival_ Transport Event. Transport Event
PlannedArrivalTransportEvent.description: The arrival planned by the party providing a transportation service.

If all taxes are applied to the same taxable amount (i.e., their order of application is inconsequential), then CalculationSequenceNumeric is 1 for all tax subtotals applied to a given amount.
